snippet: STACKHOUSE--The Rev. Dr. Max L.,(July 29, 1935 - January 30, 2016). A graduate of DePauw University and Harvard Divinity School, and ordained by the United Church of Christ, he was an internationally recognized theologian in the field of Christian Social Ethics. He authored or edited 25 books and hundreds of articles. He was the Herbert Gezork Professor at Andover Newton Theological School, then the Rimmer and Ruth de Vries Professor of Reformed Theology and Public Life at Princeton Theological Seminary, where he was also director of the Abraham Kuyper Center for Public Theology. He held numerous international visiting professorships and served as president of the American Theological Society and the Society for Christian Ethics. He is survived by wife Jean Stackhouse and a loving family. 1/3
